channel.title: Send multiple consecutive transactions in a short time,how do ensure the unique transaction?
channel.description: have any nonce to do that?

item.title: Send multiple consecutive transactions in a short time,how do ensure the unique transaction?
item.dc:creator: Faraz | Radstakes.com
item.description:
Several of the guys in the developer channel have had success with 3-5s delay before submitting the next tx.

item.title: Send multiple consecutive transactions in a short time,how do ensure the unique transaction?
item.dc:creator: abel
item.description:
what`s the interval time? 5 seconds is enough to ensure the last tx is final?

item.source: Send multiple consecutive transactions in a short time,how do ensure the unique transaction?

item.title: Send multiple consecutive transactions in a short time,how do ensure the unique transaction?
item.dc:creator: Faraz | Radstakes.com
item.description:
Currently if you attempt consecutive txs in a short time frame, the second will likely fail as it may attempt to use the same UTXO as the first. Currently you need to wait a few seconds before attempting the next tx. At Babylon release in 2023 this will be handled much better.

Read full topic
item.source: Send multiple consecutive transactions in a short time,how do ensure the unique transaction?
